title: Valid credentials should allow user to login
testName: Login Valid credentials should allow user to login
testError: Timed out retrying after 6000ms: Expected to find content: 'wrong test' but never did.
testCommands: log Mocha before each in common
step **Valid username 'binhle0106@gmail.com' and password 'Testing@123' are entered**
assert expected **:cy-contains('wrong test'), [type='submit'][value~='wrong test']** to be **visible**
